availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James S. Masoner (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, policeman)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, policeman. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Wade Masoner. Father of Charles W. Masoner, James E. Masoner, and Susan Masoner. Laborer in Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Policeman in Lexington in 1860. Policeman in Lexington in 1863. Agent for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in the requisition of James Gartlin from the State of Ohio in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1, p. 153A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 3, p. 592.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 1, p. 188A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Fayette County, KY, July 1863, p. 36.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, Film 000355061.
KYR-0001-006-0064.
